name: Roastmydog
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: roast my dog
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Your dog just got it's very own comedy roasting!


To use this skill, enable it in the Alexa app and ask Alexa to open the Roast My Dog skill.


The first time you use this skill, you need to say your dog's name. You can change your dog's name at any time by saying "set my dog name to" and then the name of your dog.


To delete your dog's name, say "forget my dog's name".


To start, just say "roast my dog." Alexa will then begin roasting your dog by saying things like "if you want to impress me, get a job!"


You can ask for another roast if you want more by saying "again", or end the skill.


You can also have Alexa automatically roast your dog by setting a routine. To do this, create a new routine in the Alexa App. Set the trigger to be barking. Then select a custom action with "Open Roast My Dog".
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
